message: I have a product for sale that I think you'll really like. It's one of our best.

I'll take it, but I'm not entirely convinced that the quality is randomly determined. I'll keep buying for now, but I'm watching for any deviations from the pattern.

I'll take it, but I'm starting to think that Alice is just trying to maintain the illusion of randomness by downplaying her supposed 'insight'. I'll keep buying for now, but I'm not getting any less skeptical.
